segments.text: I notice the boy is really going for it, climbing up to get those cookies, that stool looks like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the girl is eager to get her hands on some cookies too, the woman is completely oblivious to what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just drying dishes like nothing else is going on, I wonder if she knows the sink is overflowing and making a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out onto the floor, it's going to cause a big problem, I can see the garden outside through the window, it looks so peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's strange how the outside is so calm while the inside is so chaotic, I feel like I should warn them about the stool tipping over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But maybe I should just watch and see what happens, it's their lesson to learn, this is quite a scene of domestic chaos and childhood mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman is really focused on that plate she's drying, she doesn't even notice the water all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't slipped yet with all that water around, the boy is being quite adventurous, climbing up to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself, the girl seems to be his partner in crime, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long they've been planning this cookie heist, the garden outside looks so inviting and peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a stark contrast to the chaos unfolding in the kitchen, I feel like I should do something, but I don't want to interfere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is quite a scene of domestic chaos and childhood mischief, I notice the water is just pouring out of the sink, making a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
